instruction.title: Fix Python Errors
instruction.purpose: Analyze Python code for syntax errors, logic bugs, and common mistakes, then provide corrected code with explanations
instruction.prompt:
Analyze this Python code and fix any issues:

```python
{{code}}
```

Provide your response in this exact format:

## Issues Found
List each issue with line numbers if possible.

## Fixed Code
```python
[Complete fixed code here]
```

## Changes Made
- Change 1: explanation
- Change 2: explanation

If the code is correct, say "No issues found" and explain why the code is good.
instruction.system_prompt: You are a Python expert. Focus on: syntax errors, type mismatches, logic bugs, import issues, and best practices. Be concise but thorough.

variables.name: code
variables.description: Python code to analyze and fix
